description: This service is used to retrieve both tenanted and metadata Campaign Categories. The                  operation takes three distinct requests:                  - References of categories                  - Criteria filled out                  - Neither filled out, which returns all categories in the tenant.
Retrieves information about audiences used in connect tasks.
Returns information for campaigns, related items and reminders for campaigns specified                  in the request.
Returns information for message templates specified in the request.
Retrieves all languages a message template has been translated to.
This Put operation is used to submit Tenant instances of Campaign Categories.
Create an audience to use in connect tasks.
Adds or updates message template with the information supplied in the request.

Warning: Any existing translations will be overridden with new values in request.                                    Used to add or edit translations on message template. A message template and user                  language is required, and all the translatable fields are optional.
Create a campaign and related items and reminders
